ModMetaData.name: TragicTheCluckering - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: AliceTries
ModMetaData.description:
Lo lord of layers proudly comb-crested Hero to hens father to feathers Crowing sun-caller weaver of wattle Elder to eggs.
its a magic chicken gun... What? No it doesnt shoot chickens, It turns yonder recipient into a Tragic Chicken.
Will all the brains of a human and none of the body parts.
Better aim well.
